title: Veil
medium: Technique: satin and double running embroidery stitches on plain weave
inscribed: Translation of verse (supplied by donor) "We must value one another. We must be good to one another. This world is left to no one. Do good and good will be done to you. "
dimensions: H x W (including fringe): 131 x 128 cm (51 9/16 x 50 3/8 in.)
description: Square veil. Field is a repeating motif which looks like writing, Border is a text in Islamic writing.

tombstone.epitaph: Veil.Technique: satin and double running embroidery stitches on plain weave. 1941-2-1.
